scripts.publish:ubuntu: rm -Rf ./dist/ && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../dist/bin src/WebApp/WebApp.csproj -r ubuntu.16.04-x64 && npm install && cp -r ./node_modules ./dist/bin/
scripts.publish:osx: rm -Rf ./dist/ && dotnet publish -c Release -o ../../dist/bin src/WebApp/WebApp.csproj -r osx.10.13-x64 && npm install && cp -r ./node_modules ./dist/bin/
scripts.dist: npm run publish:osx && cd dist/bin/ && dotnet WebApp.dll
